title: Object-Based Support Strategies for Reusing Learning Design Knowledge

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with basic instructional design theories and digital learning tool implementation
context.additional_context: Blended classroom environment for social studies curriculum development, emphasizing practical learning through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Achieve over 80% reuse efficiency when designing social studies curricula using learning design objects
Eliminate over 90% redundancy in design rules by applying object-based classification algorithms
Implement a structural model for a Learning Design Repository (LDR) through team projects
Generate three or more actual curriculum design cases using digital tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
